EmailTemplate.name: 2019.11.06 - BS - Weekly Offer #1.BS - Weekly Offer #1
EmailTemplate.subject: 15% OFF Your Entire Order!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To show our appreciation for your business, here’s 15% OFF** your next purchase of $100 or more.
Offer valid for one week only until November 12, 2019. Use code 1911SALE
$39.99 $105.99 EcoTone Remanufactured Dell Black Standard Yield Universal Drum Shop Now $9.59 $19.19 Post-it Super Sticky Full-Adhesive Notes Shop Now $14.50 $18.18 Bankers Box 4” Magazine File Folders Shop Now $17.16 $34.31 Pentel Illumina Highlighter, Chisel 0.5 mm Shop Now Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1911SALE at checkout. Not valid on bottled water, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires November 12, 2019. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited ${customBodyHtml1}
